     20 using namespace re2;
     21 using namespace std;
     22 
     23 const unsigned kMinWeight = 16;
     24 const int kMaxWidth       = 32;
     25 const int kMaxRecursion   = 10;
     26 const int kMaxNodes       = (1 << 24);
     27 
     28 namespace {
     29     static QueryPlan::Stats null_stats;
     30 };
     31 
     32 QueryPlan::Stats::Stats ()
     33     : selectivity_(1.0), depth_(0), nodes_(1), tail_paths_(1) {
     34 }
     35 
     36 QueryPlan::Stats QueryPlan::Stats::insert(const value_type& val) const {
     37     Stats out(*this);
     38     if (out.selectivity_ == 1.0) {
     39         out.selectivity_ = 0.0;
     40         out.tail_paths_  = 0;
     41     }
     42 
     43     const Stats& rstats = val.second ? val.second->stats() : null_stats;
     44 
     45     // There are 100 printable ASCII characters. As a zeroth-order
     46     // approximation, assume our corpus is random strings of printable
     47     // ASCII characters.  The exact computation of selectivity turn
     48     // out not to matter all that much in most cases.
     49     out.selectivity_ += (val.first.second - val.first.first + 1)/100. * rstats.selectivity_;
     50     out.depth_ = max(depth_, rstats.depth_ + 1);
     51     out.nodes_ += (val.first.second - val.first.first + 1) * rstats.nodes_;
     52     if (!val.second)
     53         out.tail_paths_ += (val.first.second - val.first.first + 1);
     54 
     55     return out;
     56 }
     57 
     58 QueryPlan::Stats QueryPlan::Stats::concat(const QueryPlan::Stats& rhs) const {
     59     Stats out(*this);
     60     out.selectivity_ *= rhs.selectivity_;
     61     out.depth_ += rhs.depth_;
     62     out.nodes_ += tail_paths_ * rhs.nodes_;
     63     out.tail_paths_ *= rhs.tail_paths_;
     64 
     65     return out;
     66 }
     67 
     68 void QueryPlan::insert(const value_type& val) {
     69     stats_ = stats_.insert(val);
     70 
     71     edges_.insert(val);
     72     if (val.second && !(val.second->anchor & kAnchorRight)) {
     73         anchor &= ~kAnchorRight;
     74     }
     75 }
     76 
     77 double QueryPlan::selectivity() {
     78     if (empty())
     79         assert(stats_.selectivity_ == 1.0);
     80 
     81     return stats_.selectivity_;
     82 }
     83 
     84 unsigned QueryPlan::weight() {
     85     if (1/selectivity() > double(numeric_limits<unsigned>::max()))
     86         return numeric_limits<unsigned>::max() / 2;
     87     return 1/selectivity();
     88 }
     89 
     90 long QueryPlan::nodes() {
     91     return stats_.nodes_;
     92 }
     93 
     94 int QueryPlan::depth() {
     95     return stats_.depth_;
     96 }
     97 
     98 void QueryPlan::collect_tails(list<QueryPlan::iterator>& tails) {
     99     set<QueryPlan*> seen;
    100     collect_tails(tails, seen);
    101 }
    102 
    103 void QueryPlan::collect_tails(list<QueryPlan::const_iterator>& tails) {
    104     list<iterator> tmp;
    105     collect_tails(tmp);
    106     tails.insert(tails.end(), tmp.begin(), tmp.end());
    107 }
    108 
    109 void QueryPlan::collect_tails(list<QueryPlan::iterator>& tails,
    110                              set<QueryPlan*> &seen) {
    111     if (seen.find(this) != seen.end())
    112         return;
    113     seen.insert(this);
    114 
    115     for (auto it = begin(); it != end(); ++it) {
    116         if (it->second)
    117             it->second->collect_tails(tails, seen);
    118         else
    119             tails.push_back(it);
    120     }
    121 }
    122 
    123 void QueryPlan::concat(intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> rhs) {
    124     assert(anchor & kAnchorRight);
    125     assert(rhs->anchor & kAnchorLeft);
    126     assert(!empty());
    127 
    128     if (rhs->empty())
    129         return;
    130 
    131     list<QueryPlan::iterator> tails;
    132     collect_tails(tails);
    133     for (auto it = tails.begin(); it != tails.end(); ++it) {
    134         assert(!(*it)->second);
    135         (*it)->second = rhs;
    136     }
    137     if (anchor & kAnchorRepeat)
    138         anchor &= ~kAnchorLeft;
    139     if ((rhs->anchor & (kAnchorRepeat|kAnchorRight)) != kAnchorRight)
    140         anchor &= ~kAnchorRight;
    141 
    142     stats_ = stats_.concat(rhs->stats());
    143 }
    144 
    145 static string StrChar(uchar c) {
    146     if (c > ' ' && c <= '~')
    147         return strprintf("%c", c);
    148     return strprintf("\\x%02x", c);
    149 }
    150 
    151 static string ToString(QueryPlan *k, int indent = 0) {
    152     string out;
    153     if (k == 0)
    154         return strprintf("%*.s[null]\n", indent, "");
    155     if (k->empty())
    156         return strprintf("%*.s[]\n", indent, "");
    157 
    158     for (QueryPlan::iterator it = k->begin(); it != k->end(); ++it) {
    159         out += strprintf("%*.s[%s-%s] -> \n",
    160                          indent, "",
    161                          StrChar(it->first.first).c_str(),
    162                          StrChar(it->first.second).c_str());
    163         out += ToString(it->second.get(), indent + 1);
    164     }
    165     return out;
    166 }
    167 
    168 string QueryPlan::ToString() {
    169     string out = ::ToString(this, 0);
    170 
    171     out += "|";
    172     if (anchor & kAnchorLeft)
    173         out += "<";
    174     if (anchor & kAnchorRepeat)
    175         out += "*";
    176     if (anchor & kAnchorRight)
    177         out += ">";
    178     return out;
    179 }
    180 
    181 class IndexWalker : public Regexp::Walker<intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> > {
    182 public:
    183     IndexWalker() { }
    184     virtual intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan>
    185     PostVisit(Regexp* re, intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> parent_arg,
    186               intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> pre_arg,
    187               intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> *child_args, int nchild_args);
    188 
    189     virtual intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan>
    190     ShortVisit(Regexp* re,
    191                intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> parent_arg);
    192 
    193 private:
    194     IndexWalker(const IndexWalker&);
    195     void operator=(const IndexWalker&);
    196 };
    197 
    198 namespace {
    199     typedef map<pair<intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan>, intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> >,
    200                 intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> > alternate_cache;
    201 
    202     intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> Alternate(alternate_cache&,
    203                                    intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan>,
    204                                    intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan>);
    205 
    206     string RuneToString(Rune r) {
    207         char buf[UTFmax];
    208         int n = runetochar(buf, &r);
    209         return string(buf, n);
    210     }
    211 
    212     intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> Any() {
    213         return intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan>(new QueryPlan());
    214     }
    215 
    216     intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> Empty() {
    217         return intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan>(new QueryPlan(kAnchorBoth));
    218     }
    219 
    220     intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> Literal(string s) {
    221         intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> k = 0;
    222         for (string::reverse_iterator it = s.rbegin();
    223              it != s.rend(); ++it) {
    224             k = intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan>(new QueryPlan(pair<uchar, uchar>(*it, *it), k));
    225         }
    226         k->anchor = kAnchorBoth;
    227         return k;
    228     }
    229 
    230     intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> Literal(Rune r) {
    231         return Literal(RuneToString(r));
    232     }
    233 
    234     intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> CaseFoldLiteral(Rune r) {
    235         if (r > 127)
    236             return Any();
    237         if (r < 'a' || r > 'z') {
    238             return Literal(r);
    239         }
    240         intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> k(new QueryPlan(kAnchorBoth));
    241         k->insert(make_pair(make_pair((uchar)r, (uchar)r), (QueryPlan*)0));
    242         k->insert(make_pair(make_pair((uchar)r - 'a' + 'A',
    243                                       (uchar)r - 'a' + 'A'), (QueryPlan*)0));
    244         return k;
    245     }
    246 
    247     intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> Literal(Rune *runes, int nrunes) {
    248         string lit;
    249 
    250         for (int i = 0; i < nrunes; i++) {
    251             lit.append(RuneToString(runes[i]));
    252         }
    253 
    254         return Literal(lit);
    255     }
    256 
    257     intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> Concat(intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> *children, int nchildren);
    258     intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> CaseFoldLiteral(Rune *runes, int nrunes) {
    259         if (nrunes == 0)
    260             return Empty();
    261         std::vector<intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> > keys;
    262         for (int i = 0; i < nrunes; ++i) {
    263             keys.push_back(CaseFoldLiteral(runes[i]));
    264         }
    265         return Concat(&keys[0], nrunes);
    266     }
    267 
    268     intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> LexRange(const string &lo, const string& hi) {
    269         if (lo.size() == 0 && hi.size() == 0)
    270             return intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan>();
    271         if (lo.size() == 0)
    272             return Literal(hi);
    273 
    274         intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> out(new QueryPlan(kAnchorBoth));
    275         assert(hi.size() != 0);
    276         if (lo[0] < hi[0])
    277             out->insert(QueryPlan::value_type
    278                         (pair<uchar, uchar>(lo[0], hi[0] - 1), (QueryPlan*)0));
    279         out->insert(QueryPlan::value_type
    280                     (pair<uchar, uchar>(hi[0], hi[0]),
    281                      LexRange(lo.substr(1), hi.substr(1))));
    282         return out;
    283     }
    284 
    285     intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> CClass(CharClass *cc) {
    286         if (cc->size() > kMaxWidth)
    287             return Any();
    288 
    289         intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> k(new QueryPlan(kAnchorBoth));
    290 
    291         for (CharClass::iterator i = cc->begin(); i != cc->end(); ++i) {
    292             if (i->hi < Runeself)
    293                 k->insert(QueryPlan::value_type
    294                           (pair<uchar, uchar>(i->lo, i->hi),
    295                            (QueryPlan*)0));
    296             else {
    297                 alternate_cache cache;
    298                 k = Alternate(cache, k, LexRange(RuneToString(i->lo),
    299                                                  RuneToString(i->hi)));
    300             }
    301         }
    302 
    303         return k;
    304     }
    305 
    306     bool ShouldConcat(intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> lhs, intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> rhs) {
    307         assert(lhs && rhs);
    308         if (!(lhs->anchor & kAnchorRight) ||
    309             !(rhs->anchor & kAnchorLeft))
    310             return false;
    311         if (lhs->empty())
    312             return false;
    313         QueryPlan::Stats concat = lhs->stats().concat(rhs->stats());
    314         if (concat.nodes_ >= kMaxNodes)
    315             return false;
    316         return true;
    317     }
    318 
    319     bool Prefer(const QueryPlan::Stats& lhs,
    320                 const QueryPlan::Stats& rhs) {
    321         return (lhs.selectivity_ < rhs.selectivity_);
    322         /*
    323         return (kRECost * lhs.selectivity_ + kNodeCost * lhs.nodes_ <
    324                 kRECost * rhs.selectivity_ + kNodeCost * rhs.nodes_);
    325         */
    326     }
    327 
    328     intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> Concat(intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> lhs, intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> rhs) {
    329         assert(lhs);
    330         intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> out = lhs;
    331 
    332         debug(kDebugIndexAll,
    333               "Concat([%s](%ld), [%s](%ld)) = ",
    334               lhs ? lhs->ToString().c_str() : "",
    335               lhs->nodes(),
    336               rhs ? rhs->ToString().c_str() : "",
    337               rhs->nodes());
    338 
    339         if (ShouldConcat(lhs, rhs)) {
    340             out->concat(rhs);
    341         } else if(Prefer(lhs->stats(), rhs->stats()))  {
    342             out->anchor &= ~kAnchorRight;
    343         } else {
    344             out = rhs;
    345             out->anchor &= ~kAnchorLeft;
    346         }
    347 
    348         debug(kDebugIndexAll, "[%s]", out->ToString().c_str());
    349 
    350         return out;
    351     }
    352 
    353     QueryPlan::Stats TryConcat(intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> *start,
    354                               intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> *end) {
    355         QueryPlan::Stats st = (*start)->stats();
    356         debug(kDebugIndexAll, "TryConcat: Searching suffix of length %d",
    357               int(end - start));
    358         if (!*start || !((*start)->anchor & kAnchorRight) || (*start)->empty()) {
    359             debug(kDebugIndexAll, "!ConcatRight, returning early.");
    360             return st;
    361         }
    362         for (intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> *ptr = start + 1; ptr != end; ptr++) {
    363             if (!*(ptr) || !((*ptr)->anchor & kAnchorLeft))
    364                 break;
    365             QueryPlan::Stats concat = st.concat((*ptr)->stats());
    366 
    367             if (concat.nodes_ >= kMaxNodes)
    368                 break;
    369 
    370             st = concat;
    371 
    372             if (((*ptr)->anchor & (kAnchorRepeat|kAnchorRight)) != kAnchorRight)
    373                 break;
    374         }
    375         debug(kDebugIndexAll, "TryConcat: nodes=%ld, selectivity=%f",
    376               st.nodes_, st.selectivity_);
    377         return st;
    378     }
    379 
    380     intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> Concat(intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> *children,
    381                                 int nchildren) {
    382         intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> *end = children + nchildren, *best_start = 0, *ptr;
    383         QueryPlan::Stats best_stats;
    384 
    385         debug(kDebugIndexAll, "Concat: Searching %d positions", nchildren);
    386         for (ptr = children; ptr != end; ptr++) {
    387             QueryPlan::Stats st = TryConcat(ptr, end);
    388             if (st.nodes_ > 1 && Prefer(st, best_stats)) {
    389                 debug(kDebugIndexAll, "Concat: Found new best: %d: %f",
    390                       int(ptr - children), st.selectivity_);
    391                 best_start = ptr;
    392                 best_stats = st;
    393             }
    394         }
    395 
    396         if (best_start == 0) {
    397             debug(kDebugIndexAll, "Concat: No good results found.");
    398             return Any();
    399         }
    400 
    401         intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> out = *best_start;
    402         for (ptr = best_start + 1; ptr != end; ptr++) {
    403             out = Concat(out, *ptr);
    404         }
    405         if (best_start != children)
    406             out->anchor &= ~kAnchorLeft;
    407         return out;
    408     }
    409 
    410     bool intersects(const pair<uchar, uchar>& left,
    411                     const pair<uchar, uchar>& right) {
    412         if (left.first <= right.first)
    413             return left.second >= right.first;
    414         else
    415             return right.second >= left.first;
    416     }
    417 
    418     enum {
    419         kTakeLeft  = 0x01,
    420         kTakeRight = 0x02,
    421         kTakeBoth  = 0x03
    422     };
    423 
    424     int Merge(alternate_cache& cache,
    425               intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> out,
    426               pair<uchar, uchar>& left,
    427               intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> lnext,
    428               pair<uchar, uchar>& right,
    429               intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> rnext) {
    430         if (intersects(left, right)) {
    431             debug(kDebugIndexAll,
    432                   "Processing intersection: <%hhx,%hhx> vs. <%hhx,%hhx>",
    433                   left.first, left.second, right.first, right.second);
    434             if (left.first < right.first) {
    435                 out->insert
    436                     (make_pair(make_pair(left.first,
    437                                          right.first - 1),
    438                                lnext));
    439                 left.first = right.first;
    440             } else if (right.first < left.first) {
    441                 out->insert
    442                     (make_pair(make_pair(right.first,
    443                                          left.first - 1),
    444                                rnext));
    445                 right.first = left.first;
    446             }
    447             /* left and right now start at the same location */
    448             assert(left.first == right.first);
    449 
    450             uchar end = min(left.second, right.second);
    451             out->insert
    452                 (make_pair(make_pair(left.first, end),
    453                            Alternate(cache, lnext, rnext)));
    454             if (left.second > end) {
    455                 left.first = end+1;
    456                 return kTakeRight;
    457             } else if (right.second > end) {
    458                 right.first = end+1;
    459                 return kTakeLeft;
    460             }
    461             return kTakeBoth;
    462         }
    463         /* Non-intersecting */
    464         if (left.first < right.first) {
    465             out->insert(make_pair(left, lnext));
    466             return kTakeLeft;
    467         }
    468         assert(right.first < left.first);
    469         out->insert(make_pair(right, rnext));
    470         return kTakeRight;
    471     }
    472 
    473     intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> AlternateInternal(alternate_cache& cache,
    474                                            intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> lhs,
    475                                            intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> rhs) {
    476         if (lhs == rhs)
    477             return lhs;
    478         if (!lhs || !rhs ||
    479             lhs->empty() || rhs->empty() ||
    480             lhs->size() + rhs->size() >= kMaxWidth)
    481             return Any();
    482 
    483         static int recursion_depth = 0;
    484         RecursionCounter guard(recursion_depth);
    485         if (recursion_depth > kMaxRecursion)
    486             return Any();
    487 
    488         intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> out(new QueryPlan(lhs->anchor & rhs->anchor & (kAnchorLeft|kAnchorRight)));
    489         QueryPlan::const_iterator lit, rit;
    490         lit = lhs->begin();
    491         rit = rhs->begin();
    492         pair<uchar, uchar> left;
    493         if (lit != lhs->end())
    494             left = lit->first;
    495         pair<uchar, uchar> right = rit->first;
    496         if (rit != rhs->end())
    497             right = rit->first;
    498         while (lit != lhs->end() && rit != rhs->end()) {
    499             int action = Merge(cache, out, left, lit->second, right, rit->second);
    500             if (action & kTakeLeft)
    501                 if (++lit != lhs->end())
    502                     left = lit->first;
    503             if (action & kTakeRight)
    504                 if (++rit != rhs->end())
    505                     right = rit->first;
    506         }
    507 
    508         if (lit != lhs->end()) {
    509             out->insert(make_pair(left, lit->second));
    510             ++lit;
    511         }
    512         if (rit != rhs->end()) {
    513             out->insert(make_pair(right, rit->second));
    514             ++rit;
    515         }
    516 
    517         for (; lit != lhs->end(); ++lit)
    518             out->insert(*lit);
    519         for (; rit != rhs->end(); ++rit)
    520             out->insert(*rit);
    521 
    522         return out;
    523     }
    524 
    525     intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> Alternate(alternate_cache& cache,
    526                                    intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> lhs,
    527                                    intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> rhs) {
    528         auto it = cache.find(make_pair(lhs, rhs));
    529         if (it != cache.end())
    530             return it->second;
    531         intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> out = AlternateInternal(cache, lhs, rhs);
    532         cache[make_pair(lhs, rhs)] = out;
    533         return out;
    534     }
    535 
    536 };
    537 
    538 intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> constructQueryPlan(const re2::RE2 &re) {
    539     IndexWalker walk;
    540 
    541     Regexp *sre = re.Regexp()->Simplify();
    542     intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> key = walk.WalkExponential(sre, 0, 10000);
    543     sre->Decref();
    544 
    545     if (key && key->weight() < kMinWeight)
    546         key = 0;
    547     return key;
    548 }
    549 
    550 intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan>
    551 IndexWalker::PostVisit(Regexp* re, intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> parent_arg,
    552                        intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> pre_arg,
    553                        intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> *child_args,
    554                        int nchild_args) {
    555     intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> key;
    556 
    557     switch (re->op()) {
    558     case kRegexpNoMatch:
    559     case kRegexpEmptyMatch:      // anywhere
    560     case kRegexpBeginLine:       // at beginning of line
    561     case kRegexpEndLine:         // at end of line
    562     case kRegexpBeginText:       // at beginning of text
    563     case kRegexpEndText:         // at end of text
    564     case kRegexpWordBoundary:    // at word boundary
    565     case kRegexpNoWordBoundary:  // not at word boundary
    566         key = Empty();
    567         break;
    568 
    569     case kRegexpAnyChar:
    570     case kRegexpAnyByte:
    571         key = Any();
    572         break;
    573 
    574     case kRegexpLiteral:
    575         if (re->parse_flags() & Regexp::FoldCase) {
    576             key = CaseFoldLiteral(re->rune());
    577         } else {
    578             key = Literal(re->rune());
    579         }
    580         break;
    581 
    582     case kRegexpCharClass:
    583         key = CClass(re->cc());
    584         break;
    585 
    586     case kRegexpLiteralString:
    587         if (re->parse_flags() & Regexp::FoldCase) {
    588             key = CaseFoldLiteral(re->runes(), re->nrunes());
    589         } else {
    590             key = Literal(re->runes(), re->nrunes());
    591         }
    592         break;
    593 
    594     case kRegexpConcat:
    595         key = Concat(child_args, nchild_args);
    596         break;
    597 
    598     case kRegexpAlternate:
    599         {
    600             alternate_cache cache;
    601             key = child_args[0];
    602             for (int i = 1; i < nchild_args; i++)
    603                 key = Alternate(cache, key, child_args[i]);
    604         }
    605         break;
    606 
    607     case kRegexpStar:
    608     case kRegexpQuest:
    609         key = Any();
    610         break;
    611 
    612     case kRegexpCapture:
    613         key = child_args[0];
    614         break;
    615 
    616     case kRegexpRepeat:
    617         if (re->min() == 0)
    618             return Any();
    619     case kRegexpPlus:
    620         key = child_args[0];
    621         if ((key->anchor & kAnchorBoth) == kAnchorBoth)
    622             key->anchor |= kAnchorRepeat;
    623         break;
    624 
    625     default:
    626         assert(false);
    627     }
    628 
    629     assert(key);
    630 
    631     debug(kDebugIndex, "* INDEX %s ==> ", re->ToString().c_str());
    632     if (key)
    633         debug(kDebugIndex, "[weight %d, nodes %ld, depth %d]",
    634               key->weight(), key->nodes(), key->depth());
    635     else
    636         debug(kDebugIndex, "nul");
    637 
    638     debug(kDebugIndexAll, "           ==> [%s]",
    639           key ? key->ToString().c_str() : "nul");
    640 
    641     if ((debug_enabled & kDebugIndex) && key)
    642         key->check_rep();
    643 
    644     return key;
    645 }
    646 
    647 intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan>
    648 IndexWalker::ShortVisit(Regexp* re, intrusive_ptr<QueryPlan> parent_arg) {
    649     return Any();
    650 }
    651 
    652 void QueryPlan::check_rep() {
    653     pair<uchar, uchar> last = make_pair('\0', '\0');
    654     for (iterator it = begin(); it != end(); ++it) {
    655         assert(!intersects(last, it->first));
    656         last = it->first;
    657     }
    658 }
    659 
    660 void intrusive_ptr_add_ref(QueryPlan *key) {
    661     ++key->refs_;
    662 }
    663 
    664 void intrusive_ptr_release(QueryPlan *key) {
    665     if (--key->refs_ == 0)
    666         delete key;
    667 }
